title: Switchable divergent synthesis of chiral indole derivatives via catalytic asymmetric dearomatization of 2,3-disubstituted indoles
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15591-15596
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03231D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tingting Liu, Jianbin Wang, Rou Xiao, Junling Zhao
A CPA-catalyzed switchable divergent synthesis of chiral indolenines/indolines via the CADA of 2,3-disubstituted indoles has been described. The post-processing conditions played a key role for the structure switch of the final products.
